intro: As a software engineer, I enjoy working at the intersection between design and code. I approach engineering challenges through UX lenses, with simplicity and usability at the forefront. Some of the technologies I use everyday are Ruby on Rails, Coffeescript, and Sass.

items.title: Depict Website
items.subtitle: Front-end Framework and Styleguide
items.description: An essay on art as a way of life and life as raw materials of art

items.title: CreativePPL
items.subtitle: Prototype for creative careers platform
items.description: CreativePPL is a careers platform geared towards web and mobile professionals in Thailand. I worked on this project as an intern at MAQE in Bangkok. Over the span of ten weeks, we conducted market research, developed wireframes and a proof of concept. The web application is built in Ruby on Rails.

items.title: MEWOPH.COM
items.subtitle: Personal website
items.description: The compiler takes a C source code and generates assembly language instructions. This project gave me a good understanding of what happens on the stack when an instruction is called, as well as of the operations needed prior to and after each instruction call.
